channel.title: Pages on Welcome
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Welcome

item.title: About
item.description: About My name is Josh Erickson and I live in Eureka, MT. I’m a hydrologist for the USDA Forest Service. I’m married to my lovely wife Mandy, who is the best! We have a 8 year old fur-baby named marley (see below). I like to nerd out on stats, math and environmental sciences but also get out in the woods and get lost.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Please leave comments or contact me below. Thanks. joshua.l.erickson@usda.gov
